executable.title: BRAINSSnapShotWriter
executable.description: Create 2D snapshot of input images. Mask images are color-coded

image.name: inputVolumes
image.label: inputVolumes
image.description: Input image volume list to be extracted as 2D image. Multiple input is possible. At least one input is required.

image.name: inputBinaryVolumes
image.label: inputBinaryVolumes
image.description: Input mask (binary) volume list to be extracted as 2D image. Multiple input is possible.

float-vector.name: inputSliceToExtractInPhysicalPoint
float-vector.label: inputSliceToExtractInPhysicalPoint
float-vector.description: 2D slice number of input images. For autoWorkUp output, which AC-PC aligned, 0,0,0 will be the center.

integer-vector.name: inputSliceToExtractInIndex
integer-vector.label: inputSliceToExtractInIndex
integer-vector.description: 2D slice number of input images. For size of 256*256*256 image, 128 is usually used.

integer-vector.name: inputSliceToExtractInPercent
integer-vector.label: inputSliceToExtractInPercent
integer-vector.description: 2D slice number of input images. Percentage input from 0%-100%. (ex. --inputSliceToExtractInPercent 50,50,50

integer-vector.name: inputPlaneDirection
integer-vector.label: inputPlaneDirection
integer-vector.description: Plane to display. In general, 0=saggital, 1=coronal, and 2=axial plane.

file.name: outputFilename
file.label: outputFilename
file.description: 2D file name of input images. Required.
